item.title: Skilled Video Editor or Content Creator - Transforming Limited Resources into Captivating Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and highly creative Video Content Creator to join our team on Upwork. As a skilled professional, you will have the unique ability to produce engaging videos from scratch, using limited available content and transforming our existing pool into a larger, more diverse library. Your exceptional creativity and proficiency in video creation will be instrumental in delivering high-quality videos that captivate and engage our audiences across various platforms.

Responsibilities:
- Generate innovative ideas, develop concepts, and create compelling scripts for video content.
- Film and edit videos with precision, incorporating visual effects, audio enhancements, and other enhancements.
- Collaborate closely with clients to understand their objectives, brand guidelines, and target audience.
- Produce high-quality video content across multiple platforms, including YouTube, Instagram, and Facebook.
- Manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring timely delivery while maintaining exceptional attention to detail.

Requirements:
- Please attach a link to your portfolio showcasing your previous work.
- Strong understanding of visual storytelling, audio production, and video effects.
- Ability to work with limited resources and creatively expand existing content.
- This contract will be hourly using the Upwork timer.


Posted On: June 23, 2024 13:06 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Wondershare Filmora, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Graphic Design
Skills: Wondershare Filmora, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Graphic Design
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Short Form Video Editor Social Media Manager - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented Short Form Video Editor Social Media Manager to join our team. As a Video Editor, you will be responsible for creating engaging short-form videos for social media platforms. In addition, you will also manage our social media accounts and ensure content is delivered in a timely manner. This role requires strong video editing skills, proficiency in video editing software, and knowledge of social media trends. The ideal candidate should have a creative mindset, excellent communication skills, and the ability to work independently. item.title: True crime video editor - Upwork
item.description:
Proficiency in Software:

Adobe Premiere Pro: Advanced knowledge and experience in video editing, including using transitions, effects, color correction, and audio editing.
Adobe After Effects: Ability to create and integrate motion graphics, visual effects, and other advanced video effects.
Adobe Photoshop: Basic skills for creating and editing images, thumbnails, and other graphics required for video content.
Video Editing Skills:

Storytelling: Capability to create a compelling visual narrative that keeps the audience engaged for 30 to 45 minutes.
Pacing and Timing: Ensuring the video flows well and maintains viewer interest throughout its length.
Attention to Detail: Precision in cutting and trimming, ensuring smooth transitions, and maintaining high video quality.
Creativity: Ability to bring creative ideas to the table to make videos visually appealing and engaging.
Technical Requirements:

High-Quality Output: Deliver videos in high definition (1080p or higher).
Audio Editing: Clean and enhance audio, add background music, sound effects, and ensure proper synchronization.
File Management: Efficiently manage and organize project files, ensuring easy access and editing.
Copyright Compliance: Ensure that no copyrighted material is used in any edits, including music, video clips, images, or other media unless properly licensed or in the public domain.
Turnaround Time:

Timely Delivery: Ability to complete and deliver each video edit within 5 to 6 days.
Communication:

Responsive: Regular updates on progress and ability to respond to feedback promptly.
Collaboration: Willingness to work closely and take direction to meet the desired outcome.
Compensation:

Payment Terms: $90 per edit initially, with the promise of increased payment as the channel becomes self-sustainable.
Agreement: Acknowledge and agree to the current payment structure and future prospects.



Posted On: June 23, 2024 12:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:True Crime, YouTube, Video Editing, DaVinci Resolve, HTML, Adobe Premiere Pro, YouTube Video
Skills: True Crime, YouTube, Video Editing, DaVinci Resolve, HTML, Adobe Premiere Pro, YouTube Video
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: I am looking to create a few video (2-5) for Facebook Advertisement - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking to create 5 Videos for my Facebook advertisement video. I have the concept of the video and perhaps I already have the footage, picture & short video to allow you "the Editor" to combine them and create a suitable one for my Video concept.
15-20 Secs Max for the whole video.
More like a shop overview Video, From the external view into the internal View of the shop.
My current business are groceries shop.
I am only looking for someone who are serious and could complete the task as soon as possible, perhaps i would prefer someone who can communicate well, and I am also looking for a much longer term hiring although this is just the first project.
For those who is interested please included "I can easily provide you 5 videos with your concept" when you apply for the job, people who does not include will be automatically ignored.

Budget: $30

item.title: CASHCOW TEAM Needed LONG TERM To Make High Quality (Faceless Videos) Money-Making Online Content - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a full production team with script writers and video editors focused on developing engaging, high-quality videos in the "make money online" niche. Our mission is to provide value-packed content that educates and motivates our audience to leverage the internet for financial success.  We are expanding our team to include talented individuals who can innovate and grow with us in the digital space.

**Job Description:**
We are looking for a talented team who specializes in writing scripts and editing faceless videos for the make money online niche. The ideal candidate will possess a deep understanding of YouTube's platform, including trends and analytics, and be adept at producing high-quality content that does not feature on-camera talent. Your role will involve heavy editing, including the integration of engaging images, animations, and clips to convey messages effectively and engagingly.

**Responsibilities:**
- Create and edit faceless videos that are engaging and informative, focusing on the "make money online" niche.
- Research and implement the most effective editing techniques to ensure content is visually appealing.
- Innovate and recreate content based on existing popular formats from specified YouTube channels.
- Collaborate with the content team to plan and execute video projects.
- Manage multiple projects from conception through to final delivery, ensuring all videos meet the quality standards and are delivered on schedule.
- Analyze performance data to improve video strategies and increase viewer engagement and retention.

**Requirements:**
- Proven experience as a Video Editor or similar role with a portfolio showcasing your ability to produce engaging digital content.
- Strong expertise in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, After Effects, etc.).
- Excellent understanding of YouTube's platform, including SEO, analytics, and content optimization.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to meet deadlines in a remote setting.
- Creative thinker with the ability to adapt and recreate any requested video in an original and engaging manner.
- Experience creating faceless videos is highly preferred.

**Do Not Apply If:**
- You do not have a portfolio that includes relevant video production or editing work.
- You lack experience in YouTube content creation and optimization.

Budget for entire project is $10,000 and will increase depending on the success of the project. Provide your lowest flat rate bid for 8 to 15 minute. The bids should be from $45 to $85. We will only take those with the lowest bids. Keep in mind this project is long term work lasting years. We do not have time to respond to everyone so provide a competitive bid. Thanks for  applying.

This is the example of the editing style in this youtube channel link: We will further discuss the script style but you must have a great understanding of youtube and the make money online niche.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eK0S3LPU0L0


To apply, please provide your lowest flat rate bid per video. Keep in mind this project is for long term work. If your bid is too high, we will hire other candidates.



Budget: $10,000
Posted On: June 23, 2024 12:44 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Content Writing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Content Writing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
My client is seeking a dynamic Content Creator and who can elevate her social media presence to the next level. The ideal candidate will skillfully create engaging content that transcends the niche of spiritual awakening and personal development.

Responsibilities:
Create and share universally humorous content that expands beyond the account's core focus areas.
Repurpose relevant and amusing memes and reels that resonate with a broad audience.
Produce original, entertaining video reels within motivational, spiritual, and psychological themes.
Stay updated with social media trends and analytics to optimize content reach and engagement.

Requirements:
Proven experience as a content creator
Ability to create engaging and humorous content that appeals to a wide audience.
Experience with video creation and editing.
Creative mindset with the ability to produce content that fits within the themes of motivation, spirituality, and psychology.
Excellent communication and organizational skills.

Note: We are not providing raw footage. We are seeking someone to generate, edit, and create reels using existing footage. Please see attachment for examples of content.

How to Apply: Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a brief description detailing your relevant experience and why you are interested in this position.
We look forward to seeing how you can bring a fresh, engaging perspective to our social media presence!

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 12:35 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Content, Social Media Content Creation, Instagram
Skills: Social Media Content, Social Media Content Creation, Instagram
Country: United States

item.title: Editor Wanted to Take Long-Form YT Videos into Shorts - Upwork
item.description:
I am a YouTube content creator, posting long-form fishing videos. Many have titles like "Top 5 Fishing Spots" and I'm looking for an editor to take my already edited videos and turn them into multiple short-form videos for social media purposes. The editing needed is basic to intermediate, as each long-form video will be turned into shortened clips with a similar style.

Turnaround time varies, but a minimum of two short-form videos per week is acceptable. I can provide the uploaded video from YouTube, the original videos, related pictures, etc.

REQUIRED SKILLS: Looking for an editor who can add some graphics and animations to grab the audience's attention. Social media experience is preferable.

Job Description: Edit one (1) video into ten (10) short videos for $50.

This job will start here, and could potentially turn into editing the long-form content in the future, if desired. Thanks!

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 23, 2024 12:32 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Video Editing, YouTube
Skills: Social Media Video, Video Editing, YouTube
Country: United States
click to apply
